values.help: If this parameter is set to 0, the beep and LED will be turn on always until water leakage is not detected.
values.label: Alarm Duration Time

values.help: This Parameter defines beep on/off interval time when water leakage is detected.
values.label: Alarm Interval

values.help: This parameter defines beep on duration first time when water leakage is detected.
values.label: First Alarm On Time Duration

values.help: This parameter defines beep on duration after fist beep on when water leakage is detected.
values.label: Alarm on Time Duration

values.help:
This parameter defines beep on is enabled or disabled when water leakage is detected.
                0 indicate beep on is disable, but LED will be turned on when water leakage detected.
                1 indicate beep on is enabled, the BEEP and LED will be turned on when water leakage detected.
values.label: Alarm sound

values.help:
This parameter defines the function than water leakage detect is enabled or disabled.
                0 indicate disable water leakage detect,
                1 indicate enable water leakage detect.
values.label: Water Leakage Detected Report

values.help:
Basic Set Command will be sent where contains a value when the leakage is detected, the receiver will take it for consideration;
                for instance, if a lamp module is received the Basic Set Command of which value is decisive as to how bright of dim level of lamp module shall be.
values.label: Basic Set Level
